I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.

i grew up in alabama.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.

content.text: Hello! I am in the process of moving and looking for a quiet place to live.
I am a single dad living in Pittsburgh. I am able to find inspiration and capture the beauty of the city through my camera.
That sounds like a great place to live! I am from Alabama and I miss the southern food.
I have always wanted to visit the south! I have heard that the people are very friendly.
They are! I was raised in a small town and everyone knew each other.
That sounds like a great place to grow up. I am glad that you had a good childhood.
I did! I have fond memories of my mother teaching me how to cook.
That is so sweet! I love cooking with my daughter. She is only 4 years old but she is a great helper in the kitchen.
That is adorable! I bet she is a lot of fun to have around.
She is! She is my best friend.
I can imagine! I love spending time with my family.
Me too! I am glad that we both have such a great family.
Me too! It is important to have people who support you.
